entry.title: Python in banking systems
entry.summary:
Summary

[EuroPython 2012] M Dziergwa - 5 JULY 2012 in "Track Ravioli"

Description

Creating applications for banks, especially internet banking systems, is a very complicated process. Because we do it since many years, I would like to show how we do it. The talk will cover: architecture of bank transactional system tools used to create such solutions python frameworks used to build bank applications generating advanced forms and tables testing process build process logging what to focus on when you work with banks
